item.title: Fall semester overview @ UTM Computer Science (2nd year).
About Me
item.description: Hello. My name is Abdullah. I am currently a sophomore at the University of Toronto, working towards completing my undergraduate in Computer Science. I enjoy building software, and, the challenges that arise from it. In particular, I love the process of planning and implementing effective software designs, solving technical challenges that come up during the implementation phase, and the continuous journey of self-learning to increase my knowledge base. I am also very interested in the blockchain technology and it’s applications.
